Sedong, a woman with a bright personality and Chang, his first love's son appear, making him confused.(n)

programme.title: Boss In The Mirror
programme.desc: Korean celebrity-bosses go through self-examination to create a better working environment for their employees.(n)

programme.title: Discovery Of Love
programme.desc: A woman has a conflict between her new love and old love. Han Yeoreum has started a new relationship with a perfect guy called Nam Hajin. However, her ex-boyfriend Kang Taeha returns while regretting his past. A story of a love triangle among these three young people.(n)

programme.title: The Return Of Superman
programme.desc: No dad is bad in the beginning! Our fathers are alienated by their families and treated indifferently by their children! Now as they spend 48 hours without mom, we'll see their tear-filled child-rearing challenge!(n)

programme.title: No Matter What
programme.desc: This drama provides laughter and emotions with humorous characters in an extended family whose boundaries have widened through divorce and remarriage.(n)

programme.title: DOCU INSIGHT
programme.desc: DOCU INSIGHT is a unique documentary programme with no restrictions on materials and forms.(n)

programme.desc: Embark on a two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all corners of Korea! The 2 Days and 1 Night cast travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of neighbours and beautiful nature.(n)

programme.title: Mr. House Husband
programme.desc: This reality show observes six men who do both housekeeping and parenting.(n)

programme.title: Studio K

programme.title: Kamen Rider
programme.desc: Forty-five years since his transformation, Kamen returns to Japan once more to protect a girl who seems to be crucial to Shocker's plans to resurrect Ambassador Hell. Takeru Tenkuji, Kamen Rider Ghost, and Makoto Fukami, Kamen Rider Specter, join to help him.(n)

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: The story follows Chen Mo, a bar owner and 'ferryman' as he is slowly facing his own traumatic past whilst helping the people around him, including his co-partner Guan Chun, singer Ma Li and neighbour Xiao Yu.(n)

programme.title: Memory Eclipse - The Moon Is Always Full
programme.desc: On the night of a super moon, radio host Veena receives a call from her mother who had committed suicide. She begins to investigate the cause of her mother's depression and is determined to change the past, but her actions are not without consequences.(n)

programme.title: Saving Mr. Wu
programme.desc: An action-packed crime thriller based on the true story of China's famous celebrity kidnapping case. Mr. Wu is kidnapped in Beijing by Zhang Hua and three accomplices, all disguised as cops. In the ensuing 20 hours, Chinese detectives led by Chief Xing quickly form a task force to sweep the city.(n)

programme.title: Our Times
programme.desc: Lin Zhen Xin is a high-schooler who harbours a crush on her school's least ordinary, most adored boy Ouyang Fei Fan. After a chance encounter acquaints her with school ruffian Xi Tai Yu, she discovers that they have something in common: He has a crush on Fei Fan's female counterpart, Tao Min Min.(n)

programme.title: Royal Tramp II
programme.desc: Lone-er, a member of the St Dragon Sect, is bent on eliminating the person who disclosed her true identity - Wilson Bond. But more complications ensue when Lone-er is assigned to protect the Prince, whose servant is none other than Wilson Bond.(n)

programme.title: Mojin: The Lost Legend
programme.desc: Seasoned grave robbers Hu Ba Yi, Wang Kai Xuan and Shirley Yang hail from a long line of tomb raiders, but the trio have decided to hang up their boots. They get lured back into their old trade by a mysterious businesswoman who offers Kai Xuan a large sum of money to locate an ancient tomb.(n)

programme.title: A Fool In Love, Love Like A Fool
programme.desc: Xiao-wei enjoys reading picture books written by his favourite author Kauff. One day he meets Blue, a mermaid. Since then, Xiao-wei's 'normal life' becomes not so 'normal'.(n)

programme.title: Master Z: The Ip Man Legacy
programme.desc: While keeping a low profile after his defeat to Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi gets into trouble after getting in a fight with a powerful foreigner.(n)

programme.title: Chasing The Dragon
programme.desc: An illegal immigrant from Mainland China sneaks into corrupt British-colonized Hong Kong in 1963, transforming himself into a ruthless and emerging drug lord.(n)

programme.title: Apprentice (Sg)
programme.desc: A transfer to a maximum security prison eventually challenges the integrity and ethics of a young correctional officer on his way to become a chief executioner.(n)

programme.title: Mad Detective
programme.desc: A missing police pistol is connected to a series of recent heists and murders. Its owner, Wong, vanishes while pursuing suspects in the mountains, yet his partner Chi-Wai miraculously returns unharmed.(n)

programme.title: Filial Party
programme.desc: A group of contestants from various social backgrounds battle it out on a TV game show, I Am Filial, in which the one deemed most filial to his parents will win $1 million. Game show host Millionaire Liu (Mark Lee) plots to complicate things for the sake of increasing viewership ratings.(n)

programme.title: Yesterday Once More
programme.desc: Andy and Sammi star as a happily-married couple who socialise with high society, but it turns out they are actually thieves who both share the thrills and challenges of stealing.(n)

programme.title: Ace Of Sales
programme.desc: Sue takes on a sales job at a hypermarket. Her terrible promoting skill gains her atrocious sales and mocking from her senior, Mei. Fortunately, she meets a triad boss, Jack, who teaches her a sales technique that eventually transforms her.(n)

programme.title: A Fool In Love, Love Like A Fool
programme.desc: Xiao-wei enjoys reading picture books written by his favourite author Kauff. One day he meets Blue, a mermaid. Since then, Xiao-wei's 'normal life' becomes not so 'normal'.(n)

programme.title: Keep Calm And Be A Superstar
programme.desc: Zhu, from China, is a huge fan of Hong Kong cinema and has always dreamed of becoming a cop like in the movies. Unfortunately, he fails the fitness exam in China's Police Force selection because of asthma.(n)

programme.title: Monstrum
programme.desc: Yoon Gyeom is a loyal subject of King Jung Jong of Joseon. He struggles to fight against a monster that threatens King Jung Jong's life and a group of people trying to depose King Jung Jong.(n)

programme.title: To The Fore
programme.desc: A professional cycling team moves with speed and power. Race after race, the storied Radiant team, led by the brilliant Korean attacker Zheng Zhi Yuan, has become the virtual enemy of all cycling teams.(n)

programme.title: Karma
programme.desc: In the basement car park, a car in which three people stay is bugged. Zhi Wei and Jia Jia monitor and listen. The innocent Jia Jia realises that things are much more serious than she thinks.(n)

programme.title: The Adventurers
programme.desc: The world's top thieves join forces to pull off the heist of a lifetime. But when they find themselves pursued across Europe by a legendary French detective, they'll have to take their game to the next level.(n)

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: The chief investigator of ICAC Chan King-chi's childhood friend Hui Chik-yiu does a spy job in a smuggler company even after he mysteriously flees to Australia.(n)

programme.title: The Tag-Along Devil Fish
programme.desc: Master Tiger, a Taoist god, seals a demon in the body of a fish. However, a small fish jumps out of the body and a boy brings it home. After that, a series of weird incidents happens.(n)

programme.title: Spl2 A Time For Consequences
programme.desc: Undercover cop Kit becomes a junkie in order to catch Mr Hung. When the operation goes sour and Kit blows his cover, his supervisor and uncle, Wah, decides to terminate the operation. When Kit disappears without a trace, Wah tracks Kit to a prison in Thailand.(n)

programme.title: The Stool Pigeon
programme.desc: Police Detective Don Lee makes a bad call, causing a close informant to be injured. A year later, he must find a new man to go undercover inside a jewel-theft ring. Ghost Jr. doesn't want to do it, but Lee can offer deals and apply pressure that makes it hard to say no.(n)

programme.title: Stained Ep. 1
programme.desc: Veteran police officer Bo Fei Fung is brought in for questioning regarding her missing husband - distinguished detective Wayne Lau - and his alleged involvement in the murder of a police officer.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Hurt
programme.desc: Perfect world champion tennis pro Don Sri-Chang is an idol for everyone. He's both lucky in game and lucky in love, with his girlfriend being a superstar.(n)

programme.title: Mothers
programme.desc: Hyo Jin is a 32-year-old woman. Two years ago, her husband died in an accident. Her husband has a 16-year-old son, Jong Wook, from a previous marriage. Hyo Jin begins to live with Jong Wook.(n)

programme.title: Mon Mon Mon Monsters
programme.desc: Lin Shu-wei is assigned to do community service alongside some bullies. As the gang of bullies progressively accept him as one of their own, Lin partakes in their misdeeds. During a night out, the group stumble upon a pair of flesh-eating female ghouls and capture one of them.(n)

programme.title: Ah Boys To Men 3: Frogmen
programme.desc: Ah Boys to Men focuses on the theme of the definitive path for all young men in Singapore - National Service. This was Singapore's first military-themed film in 10 years, and also coincided with the 45th year of NS in the country.(n)

programme.title: For A Few Bullets
programme.desc: When a professional thief sees his lifetime goal of being the best being potentially realised in stealing a rare artifact, he finds himself entangled in a worldwide plot involving the Soviets, the Japanese and a band of outsiders. It's up to him and a special agent to save the world!(n)

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: While two criminals hide out at a woman's apartment after a botched robbery, an ex-cop tries to find a missing gun.(n)

programme.title: Drink Drank Drunk
programme.desc: Alan is a rich kid looking forward to a busy 24 hours: his birthday celebration tonight and attending court as witness in a criminal trial the next morning. Alan's lawyer knows his client's unreliability, so he pressures Alan's dependable chum Chris to tag along.(n)

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: Yuan Yuan is one of the nation's reputable designers. She has the world at her fingertips, but she carries a secret that she cannot let go. A woman opens up a distant past that she's left behind in Hokkaido.(n)

programme.title: L For Love, L For Lies Too
programme.desc: Bo is an ordinary office lady. Her mother was a very famous singer and her sister has just started to become an idol singer. Comparing herself with her mother and sister, Bo feels upset to be ordinary.(n)

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: San and Yo work as bodyguards-for-hire in Hong Kong, but business isn't exactly booming for these bumbling buddies. The two head to South Korea for a mysterious job to protect a reporter, but a hotel bombing leaves the client dead and sends them on the run as suspects.(n)

programme.title: Shadow
programme.desc: In Pei, a kingdom ruled by an unpredictable king, the military commander faces peril both inside and outside the palace walls. But he has a secret weapon: a "shadow", a look-alike who can fool both Pei's enemies and the King himself.(n)

programme.title: The Conmen In Vegas
programme.desc: Master gambler King and his sidekick Dragon have gotten a new partner in the latter's swindler cousin Nat. Together, the trio successfully con a huge fortune from the underground casino owned by Brother Man. The vicious gang boss sends his henchmen after them, and Dragon is taken.(n)

programme.title: Stained Ep. 2
programme.desc: Kidnappers of Tina Law are taunting the police with an audacity never seen before. Their provocations cause much confusion within the police force, leading them on a fruitless wild-goose chase.(n)

programme.title: Love On A Diet
programme.desc: Mimi Mo is a young exchange student in Japan who fell in love with a budding pianist, Kurokawa. Kurokawa leaves for the USA and returns to Japan as a famous musician. Mimi deals with her depression by eating and now weighs over 300 pounds. Mimi meets Fatty who helps her diet.(n)

programme.title: Sakura Guardian In The North
programme.desc: Tetsu Ezure escapes with her son from Sakhalin Island after the Soviet Union invades the area as she struggles to survive as a refugee in Abashiri City's extreme cold weather and famine.(n)

programme.title: Brotherhood Of Blades 2
programme.desc: In the Ming dynasty of China, Shen Lian, a secret police of corrupt government, is trapped by the conspiracy on a mission. To prove his innocence, he seeks the truth with a girl called Bei Zhai.(n)

programme.title: All My Goddess
programme.desc: Four ladies, Eileen, Zhou Li Jun, Chen Ruo Yan and Zhang Jia Xin were colleagues as stewardesses 10 years ago. They are reunited at Jia Xin's wedding and gather in a resort in Penang. The friends are introduced to the bridegroom Gary, a Prince Charming look-alike.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Duet
programme.desc: The story of rich kid Lee Mong Fong being entangled in a driving penalty points scandal becomes an overnight sensation in Hong Kong. The incident's only witness, Meng Tzi Leung, refuses to cooperate with the police. Detective Lau Mong Long goes undercover to investigate.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Era
programme.desc: This film tells the life story of Xiao Hong, one of China's most famous essayists and novelists, who reflected progressive thinking not frequently seen during the 1930s.(n)

programme.title: Twenty
programme.desc: Freshly graduated from high school, best friends Chi Cho, Dong Woo and Kyung Jae have reached a crucial crossroads in their young lives. It's time to think about the future.(n)

programme.title: The Bold, The Corrupt And The Beautiful
programme.desc: Madame Tang colludes and mediates between the government and private businesses for the benefits of her all-female family. One case does not go as planned, and an entire family close to Madame Tang falls victim to murder, changing Tang's relationships with her own family forever.(n)

programme.title: Buddy Cops
programme.desc: Short-tempered cop Fei constantly causes trouble with his impulsive crime-busting, and his latest transgression has earned him a transfer to the force's most useless department. There he gets paired up with Johnny, a wimpy desk-duty mama's boy.(n)

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Edith returns the abandoned items from Anita Mui's house to its original senders after the death of the famous Cantopop diva in 2003. The film revives five close fans' collective image and memory of Mui.(n)

programme.title: The Princess And The Matchmaker
programme.desc: Princess Songhwa refuses her fate to marry one of four suitors. Seo Do-yoon, skilled at interpreting marital harmony signs, is selected as the person to ascertain her best match.(n)

programme.title: The Great Magician
programme.desc: After the Revolution that overthrew the Qing Dynasty in China and established the republic, China has broken up into fiefdoms held by warlords who are busy fighting one another. A lieutenant is using magic to scare convicts into joining a warlord's army.(n)

programme.title: Stained Ep. 3
programme.desc: Shek Jin's parents have been missing after leaving their home several days ago. Major mass media outlets have been conducting interviews and making appeals to the public about Jin's missing parents.(n)

programme.title: Grace
programme.desc: Ple loves spending time with her best friend Care, who is popular for being cute. Together, they create a Facebook page for Care to share her personal photos and videos to garner 'likes' from the public.(n)

programme.title: A Man Called Hero
programme.desc: This story follows Hero Hua from an ill-omened June day in his youth to a showdown 17 years later with a disaffected member of his martial arts school, a Japanese named Invincible.(n)

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Mrs K is a story of a woman who gives everything that she has to protect her husband and daughter when enemies from her past come hunting her.(n)

programme.title: The Kid From The Big Apple
programme.desc: As Sarah's mother has to relocate to China on a work assignment, she has to turn to her estranged father back in Malaysia. To a 12-year-old contemporary youngster like Sarah, Malaysia seems like her worst nightmare come true.(n)

programme.title: The Wasted Times
programme.desc: Over the course of several decades, a deal between the Japanese army and criminals in Shanghai plays out with violence and betrayal.(n)

programme.title: Enter The Phoenix
programme.desc: Daniel Wu plays Georgie, the son of a triad king who has been chosen to take his father's place when he dies. However, the crime boss' man thinks that Georgie's roommate Sam (Eason Chan) is his leader's son, and Georgie is all too happy to play along. Sam soon finds himself in danger.(n)

programme.title: The Leakers
programme.desc: After a mutated Zika epidemic breaks out in Malaysia, an illegal hacker group, The Leakers, tries to disclose pharmaceutical company AMANAH Malaysia's conspiracy and crimes.(n)

programme.title: The Cases
programme.desc: Edmond Poon hosts psychic programmes, supported by the metapsychology masters from Southeast Asia who act as advisors, and leads a psychic exploring team to scout for little-known mysterious and supernatural cases.(n)

programme.title: Pee Nak
programme.desc: Three men on their way to monk-hood don't realise the temple at which they will receive their ordination is cursed by the wrath of Pee Nak, a mythical giant snake.(n)

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Ann is a repressed young lady whose psychological inability to consummate her marriage leads to divorce. But she undergoes seismic change after an encounter with a free-spirited chef.(n)

programme.title: My Egg Boy
programme.desc: A woman freezes her eggs and looks for the right man to start a family. In the pursuit of this man, she ends up in a wintry Swedish Province, where ice and snow become a metaphor for the unborn child who is waiting to be born.(n)

programme.title: The Miracles Of The Namiya General Store
programme.desc: In 2012, Atsuya and his two childhood friends run into an old general store. They decide to stay there until the morning. Late into the night, Atsuya sees a letter in the mailbox.(n)

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: Ling is a self-assured Police Chief Inspector who is investigating a cold-blooded serial murder case. However, due to the homicide attempt of a fellow inspector named Tai in which Ling emerged unscathed, colleagues are fast becoming aware of Ling's potential involvement.(n)

programme.title: Stained Ep. 4
programme.desc: As rapport begins to build up between Bo and Kei, triad boss Ethan Lui, a key player of the cop-killing case, is shot dead. CCTV had captured footage of Wayne Lau leaving the scene of the crime.(n)

programme.title: Throw Down
programme.desc: Sze-To was once a respected judo champion, but he lost interest in the sport. Now, Sze-To is an alcoholic who runs a night club. When Sze-To learns that his mentor and teacher has died, it knocks a hole in the wall of despair he's built around himself, and two new challenges present themselves.(n)

programme.title: Eye In The Sky
programme.desc: The surveillance team of the Crime Intelligence Unit comprises officers who are unremarkable in appearance. In the streets, they would pass you by unnoticed and unseen. They will not leave a mark.(n)

programme.title: Go Lala Go 2
programme.desc: A new cast breathes new life into the oft-adapted story of a modern woman who must learn to balance work, life and love. Lala starts a new career after a company restructures. She encounters a handsome and successful client, Chen Feng, who proposes to Lala.(n)

programme.title: Bad Genius
programme.desc: Lynn, a genius high school student who makes money by cheating in tests, receives a new task that leads her to set foot in Sydney, Australia. Lynn and her classmates have to deliver the test answers back.(n)

programme.title: Missing ()
programme.desc: In 2005, a high-profile case of a police officer who disappeared during a forest hike spawned urban legends about the existence of a gateway into another world. Those legends are now adapted into an eerie supernatural thriller.(n)

programme.title: The Kid From The Big Apple 2
programme.desc: The sequel to the critically-acclaimed The Kid From The Big Apple. Sarah is back in Malaysia to spend her holiday with grandpa, who is showing signs of dementia.(n)

programme.title: The Scoundrels
programme.desc: One night, a robber hijacks Rui when he accidentally spots a seriously injured woman in the vehicle. Now the police and the public see Rui as the suspect of the bank robbery. How can Rui get himself out of this quagmire?(n)

programme.title: Full Throttle
programme.desc: One of Hong Kong's top motorcycle racers is forced to reevaluate his entire way of life after a serious accident and the loss of a close friend.(n)

programme.title: A Fool In Love, Love Like A Fool
programme.desc: Xiao-wei enjoys reading picture books written by his favourite author Kauff. One day he meets Blue, a mermaid. Since then, Xiao-wei's 'normal life' becomes not so 'normal'.(n)

programme.title: Who Am I
programme.desc: Finding himself at a murder scene, bike courier Li Ziwei tries to escape, but the culprits force him off a bridge. The amnesia from his head injuries means he can't recognise the faces of his enemies, who have framed him for the crime.(n)

programme.title: The Last Message
programme.desc: Tim and Lee are employees of a mental hospital working as an orderly and nurse respectively. One day a crazy man named Cheng Ming, who carries a bag of trash, is institutionalised. Tim and Lee discover that the bag is full of artifacts from the Ming Dynasty.(n)

programme.title: Faces Of Horror
programme.desc: Four youngsters return to the house that claimed their friend's life to confront the demon. A single mother and her daughter live with a curse and a wandering ghost searching for her living lover.(n)

programme.title: The Lost Souls
programme.desc: The Ling family are hoping to migrate to Canada, but they all die in a gas-poisoning accident. It turns out migrating in the next life takes money, too. In order to raise funds to head west, the Lings return to the mortal world and get to work.(n)

programme.title: Wu Yen
programme.desc: Wu Yen stars Anita Mui as Emperor Qi, the male ruler of an ancient kingdom overrun by warring tribes. Qi is set to marry the warrior-heroine Wu Yen when a mischievous, bisexual sorceress known as Yin Chun falls in love with both of them and begins meddling in their affairs.(n)

programme.title: Heart Against Hearts
programme.desc: George Lam and Carol Cheng play a couple who finally settle down after a long-running love marathon. Their troubles begin when George loses his job and becomes a house-husband, while Carol and daughter (Vivian Chow) become the breadwinners of the family.(n)

programme.title: Royal Warriors
programme.desc: Policewoman Michelle Yeoh goes after revenge-seeking villains with the help of Michael Wong and Japanese agent Henry Sanada.(n)

programme.title: A Chinese Ghost Story III
programme.desc: Bai Yun and his disciple Fong journey through a small town to transport a golden idol of Buddha. However, thieves thwart their journey, sending them to take shelter at the ghostly Orchid Temple. There, Fong encounters Lotus, a female ghost at the evil bidding of the awakened Tree Devil.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Scoundrels
programme.desc: Valentino is a mediocre con-artist who crosses paths with Kwan, a fellow con-artist. Together, they impersonate various people and create numerous schemes to make money. Meanwhile, gangsters are making a scheme of their own.(n)

programme.title: Unfaithfully Yours
programme.desc: A comedy about a cheating husband on a trip to Japan who is tailed by a tabloid. All hell breaks loose when the wife shows up as well.(n)

programme.title: A True Mob Story ()
programme.desc: Triad member Cheung Dee earns his living as a parking attendant. Fending off an ambush by a rival gang leader, Cheung Dee blinds the leader of the gang, Crazy Ball.(n)

programme.title: City Hunter
programme.desc: A self-indulgent private investigator winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists and scarce food.(n)

programme.title: Paper Marriage
programme.desc: An illegal immigrant with no Green Card is subject to humiliation, and does odd things to survive - like false marriage.(n)

programme.title: Flaming Brothers
programme.desc: Alan and Tien have formed a bond since childhood that will last a lifetime. Later, they progress from pickpockets to gangsters running a successful nightclub business, but their refusal to get involved in drug trafficking incurrs the wrath of local crime boss Kao.(n)

programme.title: Cause We Are So Young
programme.desc: Paul, Chuen and Choi are three young guys who share an apartment and an assortment of girl troubles that challenges their maturity.(n)

programme.title: City Hero
programme.desc: Mark and Anthony are policemen who want to become members of the special squad.(n)

programme.title: The Intellectual Trio
programme.desc: Wong Kar-wai co-scripted this comedy about cops Leslie Cheung and Billy Lau who encounter pickpockets Sandy Lam and Joyce Ngai.(n)

programme.title: Vampire Vs. Vampire
programme.desc: Lam Ching Ying discovers that the water supply in his village has been contaminated by bats and, while in the process of digging a well to find new water supply, he inadvertently unearths the corpse of an evil priest.(n)

programme.title: Love Unto Wastes
programme.desc: Chow is assigned to investigate a murder case. He discovers the complicated relationship among four suspects.(n)

programme.title: The Attractive One
programme.desc: Sean Lau plays a barbeque restaurant owner who falls in love with Joey Yung, a beauty thearpist in a pet beauty shop. As fate would have it, Joey has a crush on someone else. Can a 30-odd-year-old who has never experienced love win the love of his life? Or are his efforts doomed to failure?(n)

programme.title: Tiger Cage
programme.desc: A team of cops get brutally exposed to violence after raiding a drug operation and discovering a link between a few members of the police force and an American crime syndicate dealing with drug trafficking.(n)

programme.title: Sunshine Friends
programme.desc: In order to save her father's television station, Elizabeth asks four funny witty guys for help, but the situation gets worse under their guide.(n)

programme.title: Teaching Sucks
programme.desc: Anthony Wong and Jan Lamb are unenthusiastic teachers, until new colleague Cathy Tsui rekindles their interest in school and life.(n)

programme.title: No Compromise
programme.desc: Tackling serious crime is Danny Lee's routine job, and his wife DoDo Cheng always worries about his safety. Cheng forces Lee to choose between abandonment of job and divorce. On the other hand, Lee racks his brains over pursuing the robbery couple, Lam Wai and Pauline Wong.(n)

programme.title: Born Wild
programme.desc: Tide immerses himself in Hong Kong's seedy underground boxing culture after the death of his fraternal twin brother Tan. Tide unexpectedly discovers that Tan led a wild life, full of violence and passionate emotions, and that his death shattered more than a few people.(n)

programme.title: Funny Triple
programme.desc: Funnymen Eric Tsang and Anthony Chan play CIDs Woodpecker and Gold Finger. They are assigned to nail the nefarious gang boss Brother Shing. Unfortunately, cracks begin to show in their friendship one day when beautiful policewoman Gigi joins their team.(n)

programme.title: Eastern Condors
programme.desc: Lam is an American army officer given a top-secret mission by the US military. Due to the dangerous nature of the mission, a group of Chinese American soldier convicts are selected to accompany him, led by Tung Ming-sun.(n)

programme.title: Spooky Encounters
programme.desc: Villager Bold Cheung, known for his willingness to do anything courageous or daring, becomes a target by the evil rich Master Tam who wants to keep Cheung's wife as his mistress. Cheung is tricked into a bet to spend the night in a haunted temple.(n)

programme.title: Millionaires Express
programme.desc: The No. 1 comedy hit of 1986 has kung-fu master Sammo Hung involved with officials, concubines, merchants and conmen in old China.(n)

programme.title: The Inspector Wears Skirts II
programme.desc: Police Academy meets Private Benjamin when the all-girl Banshees compete with the all-boy Flying Tigers to nab a criminal gang.(n)

programme.title: Queen's Bench III
programme.desc: Bumbling lawyer Alfred Cheung is assigned to a sensational murder case involving Tony Leung and Carina Lau, with farcical results.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Vampire Saga 4
programme.desc: In the rural countryside, a bespectacled Taoist priest called Four-eyed Taoist is always at odds with his neighbour, a Buddhist monk called Master Yat-yau. However their respective students, Kar-lok and Ching-ching, are friendly towards each other.(n)

programme.title: Final Victory
programme.desc: Triad leader Big Bo is a violent man, but his younger brother Hung is a nice guy who fusses around him. Bo commits a crime and is sentenced to prison for six months. Before going to prison, Bo entrusts Hung to take care of his two lovers Ping and Mimi.(n)

programme.title: Three Against The World
programme.desc: Detective Andy Lau must protect a priceless copy of the Koran against the schemes of gunman Norman Tsui Siu-keung and thief Teddy Robin.(n)

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: A former Buddhist monk returns to the ordinary world to track down the killers of his friend. He soon makes acquaintance with charming policewoman Li Feng Yi who arrests him for a strip performance in front of a public audience.(n)

programme.title: Aces Go Places IV
programme.desc: A nefarious international cartel is after a super soldier formula, the secret of which may lie with King Kong. Meanwhile, Kodojak is still experiencing domestic weirdness with wife "Hot Tongue" Ho and son Baldy Jr.(n)

programme.title: From Riches To Rags
programme.desc: Ricky and Fatso become millionaires overnight after buying a winning lottery ticket. During one of their swinging nights in town, Ricky is suddenly attacked by an upset stomach; in no time, a quack doctor diagnoses the seizure as terminal cancer.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Vampire
programme.desc: A classic Hong Kong vampire comedy about Taoist priests who inadvertently turn a corpse into a murderous zombie. The planned reburial of a village elder goes awry as the corpse resurrects into a hopping, bloodthirsty vampire, threatening mankind.(n)

programme.title: Happy Bigamist
programme.desc: Ah Sun's ex-wife Kong loses her last cent in business, and after going bankrupt is left without a place to stay. As she is entitled to own half of Ah Sun's house, she moves back. Ching, Sun's girlfriend, is determined to show who's the mistress.(n)

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: Wai Siu Bo is a lecherous wimp, who after saving Chan, the leader of the Heaven and Earth society, is made a member. After a botched first assignment for the group, he is made a servant to the Emperor, the very person the Heaven and Earth society wants to overthrow.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: According to Tin Yat's calculation, Bat Po is General Jinguo during the Song dynasty, and Siu Ling is dead in Zhuxian Town. Bat Po successfully exterminates the vampires and saves Siu Ling with guidance from Yat.(n)

programme.title: Wonder Women ()
programme.desc: A feminist comedy with buxom-but-ditzy Dodo Cheng and twiggy-but-intelligent Cecelia Yip as contestants in a beauty pageant.(n)

programme.title: The Conman
programme.desc: Previously imprisoned for an accidental killing, King returns to the world with his gambling skills intact, but his spirit gone. Help comes in the form of Skinny Dragon and his sexy sister Ching, who initially can't stand King, but eventually starts to warm to his undeniable charm.(n)

programme.title: Marry A Rich Man
programme.desc: Me, a delivery girl, declares to the heavens that she must marry a rich man. On a flight to Milan, Me meets Christmas, a cute, rich Hong Kong resident who immediately takes a shine to Me. She thinks she's hit the jackpot, but as soon as they land the two are pick-pocketed.(n)

programme.title: Project A II
programme.desc: Dragon Ma is assigned to a corrupt police precinct, and brings a squad of righteous officers with him to clean up the territory. But the influence of corrupt Superintendent Chun runs deep, and some of the pirates who threatened Ma in Project A are back looking for revenge.(n)

programme.title: The Private Eyes
programme.desc: A small detective agency has problems staying in business, and out of trouble.(n)

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: In World War II Shanghai, Tony Leung is torn between his duty to China and his love for nightclub singer Anita Mui.(n)

programme.title: Warriors Two
programme.desc: Hua stumbles upon a plot hatched by a businessman named Mo to take over the city of Fushan by killing its headman.(n)

programme.title: City Squeeze
programme.desc: Wong is a supervisor at Yau's firm, and is often taken advantage of because of his integrity and timidity. One day, Yau is stunned by a receptionist, Fung. Most of the male staff in the firm are also interested in Fung, including Wong. But Wong doesn't have the courage to approach her.(n)

programme.title: The Diary Of A Big Man
programme.desc: Chow Ting-Fat loves two women equally and cannot say no to either as both bring the proposal of marriage to him. Number one is Joey Wong, a boutique owner. Number two is Sally Yeh, a stewardess.(n)

programme.title: Those Merry Souls
programme.desc: This supernatural kung-fu comedy stars Yuen Biao as a stuntman who reluctantly takes up the family profession: a collector of dead souls.(n)

programme.title: Chase A Fortune
programme.desc: Sports reporter Xiang is hurted by the King Boxer while trying to interview him. With advice from his cousin, Xiang pretends to be handicapped in order to get compensation from the insurance company.(n)

programme.title: Operation Scorpio
programme.desc: This film is a unique combination of Drunken Master, Sanshiro Sugata and Karate Kid with ingenuity and creative moves you have never seen before!(n)

programme.title: Himalaya Singh
programme.desc: Singh is born and raised in the Himalayas. A naive yoga master, he is ordered by his parents to join a competition hosted by the King of Yoga to fight for the king's daughter. On his way, Singh meets Tally, who falls for him.(n)

programme.title: Inspector Pink Dragon
programme.desc: Nerdy Inspector Lawrence Cheng becomes the object of a scam involving heartthrob Rosamund Kwan and tycoon gangster Damian Lau.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: To seal the peach tree underground, Siu Ling reactivates the Pangu Seal. Ngan Ping is no match for Bat Po, who turns into a vampire. Meanwhile, Siu Ling arrives at the battlefield so as to bring Jim Tau back to 2004.(n)

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow II
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as the twin brother of the character he played in the first film. The sequel sees Tse-ho working together with brother Tse-kit to help the police break a counterfeit syndicate. They discover Lung is in danger of being killed by his employee, Ko.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Butcher
programme.desc: Lam Sai Wing, Master Wong Fei Hung's eldest disciple, is falsely trapped and accused by Ko who schemes to rape Lam's sister-in-law. What a trick!(n)

programme.title: Tian Di
programme.desc: Set in the 1920s, the film tells the story of Cantonese native Cheung Yat-pang who recently returned from France to Nanjing after further studies and is appointed by the government to be the first Commissioner of the opium trade ban.(n)

programme.title: The Good The Bad & The Beauty
programme.desc: A clever stewardess tries to double-cross an international smuggling ring by sneaking their loot into a hiding place.(n)

programme.title: Rouge
programme.desc: The ghost of a courtesan who died in 1934 returns to Hong Kong 53 years later, seeking to reunite with the man she loved.(n)

programme.title: The Owl VS Bumbo
programme.desc: Bumbo and Owl are partners in crime and they scam a triad big-shot out of a load of money and decide to retire. Three years later, they both receive letters from Stanley Fung, in which he informs them that he has proof of all their criminal activity.(n)

programme.title: My Father Is A Hero
programme.desc: Gong Wei is a Chinese government special agent who is assigned to work undercover in Hong Kong. To gain trust from the gang leader, Gong Wei has to take part in a shootout, taking Inspector Anita Fong as hostage.(n)

programme.title: Spiritual Love
programme.desc: Pok is tough in appearance but tender in heart. Pok chances upon a letter from Butterfly who complains about her misfortunes. Pok falls in love with Butterfly, but falling in love with a ghost will only bring out sad memories.(n)

programme.title: The Magic Touch
programme.desc: In this sci-fi comedy, Michael Hui plays a fortune-telling con-artist who turns out to really be able to "see the future". The Magic Touch features some early performances of pop star Leon Lai and comedian Dayo Wong.(n)

programme.title: Cop Of The Town
programme.desc: Ricky and Romeo are both veterans working in an elite police squad but cannot work well with a new female inspector. One day, Annie, a model, complains of being harassed by her former friend, Ricky. Romeo, who likes to flirt, takes up the case.(n)

programme.title: Fractured Follies
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat is Joe, an aimless taxi driver who knocks down May, a sweet girl afflicted with a rare problem. Joe decides to help May's family and their new grocery store, which is a run-down work-in-progress. Love blooms along the way.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Fever
programme.desc: A married businessman's ill-advised dalliance with a mysterious beauty comes back to haunt him - literally - when it turns out his bedmate is one of a family of ghosts.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Diamond
programme.desc: Anita Mui reluctantly shares office space with private eye Alex in a comedy of gangsters, insurance fraud and diamonds.(n)

programme.title: The Inspector Wears Skirts
programme.desc: Jackie Chan produced this female version of Police Academy, with cop Siblelle Hu heading an all-girl commando training camp.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Jim Tau's soul flies off when he arrives in 2004. Siu Ling and Fuk Sang attempt to seize the soul together. In the meantime, many vampires appear in 2004.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Darling
programme.desc: Tai and Josephine are a merry couple. Tai brings his wife to his hotel's annual ball. Among his colleagues, there is a notorious seducer. Tai, with the help of his close friend Choi Sum, makes every effort to protect his wife, bringing themselves into a series of hilarious and comic situations.(n)

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China
programme.desc: Set in late 19th-century Canton, this film depicts the stance taken by martial arts hero Wong Fei-Hung against foreign forces' plundering of China. When Aunt Yee arrives back from America totally westernised, Wong Fei-Hung assumes the role of her protector.(n)

programme.title: Aces Go Places II
programme.desc: Unfazed by their new popularity, King Kong and Kodojak continue to pal around, find romantic misadventures, annoy the returning Inspector "Hot Tongue" Ho, get framed for various crimes, and still regroup in time to rout the bad guys and save the day.(n)

programme.title: Parking Service
programme.desc: An optimistic Stanley decides to part with his beloved uncle and aunt and seek an ideal job. He joins a parking service team and earns good reputation for his team.(n)

programme.title: Final Justice ()
programme.desc: Cheung Tit Chu, a senior inspector of the Special Crime Investigation Department in the Police Force, likes to make decisions and execute duties independently. Cheung's character brings him into conflict with his new superior, David Law, and his work is always hindered by the latter.(n)

programme.title: Dreadnaught
programme.desc: A violent criminal named White Tiger is on the run from the police and joins a theatre troupe to hide out, killing anyone who suspects his identity. One person he unsuccessfully tries to kill several times is a cowardly laundry man named Mousy.(n)

programme.title: Heart Of Dragon
programme.desc: Jackie Chan plays a cop sacrificing his dreams to care for his retarded brother whose simplicity renders him an unsuspecting victim of a kidnapping.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Encounter
programme.desc: Crooks Tony Leung and Kent Cheng help five-year-old ghost Cheng Pak-lam achieve reincarnation in this supernatural Johnny To comedy.(n)

programme.title: Passion
programme.desc: Sylvia Chang performs in a tragic but romantic love story between two women and a man.(n)

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: Police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung-Sang finds himself in over his head when he is pulled into a 72-hour game by a cancer-suffering criminal out for vengeance on Hong Kong's organised crime syndicates.(n)

programme.title: Battle Creek Brawl
programme.desc: Set in the wild days of the roaring 1920s, this movie tells the story of a courageous martial arts expert who almost single-handedly takes on the mob. Machine guns are of no avail against his lightning-quick hands and feet.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Stars Go Places
programme.desc: The lucky stars reunite again. This time, their mission is to investigate a case of international ammunition trade that involves two gangs.(n)

programme.title: The Greatest Lover
programme.desc: Chow Chin Chun, Tall Wai and Silly Chick separate when they illegally sneak into Hong Kong. Chow accidentally meets millionaire Big Mouth Sze, who invites Chow to pretend to be a passionate gentleman.(n)

programme.title: New Journey To The West 8
programme.desc: The cast of New Journey To The West 7 returns with a new season of the series! Follow as they fulfill different missions and win dragon balls that make their dreams come true!(n)

programme.title: Thrifters On Tour: Korea
programme.desc: The hosts invite star guests and travel to different cities in Korea, and compete with each other to bring the most enjoyable vacation experience with the cheapest budget.(n)

programme.title: Tale Of The Nine Tailed
programme.desc: A romance fantasy drama that tells the story of a fearless producer determined to hunt down a nine-tailed fox who goes after evils that disrupt the order of the human world.(n)

programme.title: 100 Days My Prince
programme.desc: Prince Lee Yul falls off a cliff and nearly dies in an assassination attempt. Having lost his memory, he wanders for 100 days under a new identity. He then meets Hong Sim, head of a detective agency in Joseon.(n)

programme.desc: Kim Nam-gil and his guests, including Park Sung-woong and Go Gyu-pil, travel across the Korea Strait from the Yellow Sea to the East Sea during a yacht voyage.(n)
